topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5444a67d6368727e5ed30200#post_5444a67d6368727e5ed30200
[bq="Bryon"]So I got the initial final set up for the cast of _Shonen Jump vs. Capcom: Heroes United_, guys. :) I had to wrap up with the last 8 hidden characters. I plan to tackle DLC characters when I get the chance. Order of this list is Capcom character then their Jump rival.

Ryu
Goku
Chun-Li
Lenalee
Haggar
Kinnikuman
Felicia
Lala
Mega Man
Arale
Batsu
Yusuke
Ibuki
Naruto
Ruby Heart
Luffy
Kaijin no Soki
Ichigo
Jedah
DIO
Wesker
Light
Viewtiful Joe
Wingman
Phoenix Wright
Kankichi Ryotsu
Tron
Hitomi
Seth
Cell
Akuma
Raoh
Firebrand
Neuro
Nina
Meisuke/Nube
Jin
Seiya

Fortinbras - Final boss in Arcade Mode

So Capcom has Street Fighter, Street Fighter II, Final Fight, Darkstalkers, Mega Man, Rival Schools, Street Fighter III, Dai Kouka Frontier/Marvel vs. Capcom 2, Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams, Darkstalkers 3, Resident Evil, Viewtiful Joe, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Mega Man Legends, Street Fighter IV, Super Street Fighter II Turbo, Ghosts 'n Goblins, Breath of Fire II, and Cyberbots: Fullmetal Madness for reps, and Shonen Jump has Dragon Ball, D.Gray-man, Kinnikuman, To Love-Ru, Dr. Slump, Yu Yu Hakusho, Naruto, One Piece, Bleach, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Death Note, Yume Senshi Wingman, Kochikame, Cat's Eye, Dragon Ball Z, Fist of the North Star, Demon Detective Neuro Nogami, Hell Teacher Nubei, and Saint Seiya for reps right now.[/bq]

I was expecting Gintoki to be on the main list considering Gintama's popularity.

But that's why DLC exists.

I really want this project to be a reality. I NEED IT o_o!

You have ideas for the Arenas/Stages?
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

A few ideas have come to mind; the World Tournament Stage, Soul Society, the Hidden Leaf Village, the Thousand Sunny, the rooftops of Taiyo High School, Penguin Village, Cassandra from Fist of the North Star, Dr. Light's Lab, Kattelox Island, Metro City, Windia, Movie Land, Cassandra from Fist of the North Star...

I know I want to try to get stages that represent each of the series that the characters come from, plus DLC stages will also come with DLC characters. Though you wondering about Gin, he's a likely DLC character to choose. :)
